licence.p: This work is licenced under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 Unported Licence. To view a copy of the licence, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, USA.

objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

projectDesc.p: This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

lg.l: ø hanut ri raśanira sanira saƞ adi
yena krama śapa wogan iku tĕmbe
hana make ki śiƞamada halitan. wri reḥ,
mapan tuƞgal. yayaḥ maṙmane pa tanpa
ø kadi rag̈ane tan ana sudi
la luƞa haƞikis lampus tan pamit.,
riṅ duṙggamā ḃaya kewĕ wwaṙ tan kahiṣti
ø śaya lapas lampaḥhira ta/n ana katoliḥ
ø kuna yen ana kĕsĕliƞ ati
kapagiḥ saṅ tapa ligiḥ ri mada
sami haligiḥ ki habit. liṅnya tatakon.
ø tuhu tan. wikan. wartin. ta kaki
ø aƞusi kaḋaṅ wṛga tan ṣudi
ki paƞuwusa/n aƞliṅ haƞṛs ta wisṭi
tan lagana ki ḃaru/ mintaṙ laky age
ø tan. wuwusĕn. denya byakṣa prapti
ø ƞ kapiluḥ swaranira ki wasi
ya ḍuḥ eman tan ana kṛti
ø melik tan aṙṣa kuraṅƞ amukti
ma/ toniṅ niṅƞ asuka niṅƞ amukti rame,
ø patwa waṣa ƞoṅ kaki haƞalaƞi
ø sawaƞn/ riṅ sun iṅ lampa kaki
tiwas bisā lakw ayu tan. kneṅƞ isṭi

niṙ lka
sniṅ wirati danapunya yen tan. wruḥ panuga
tan len kaṅ densudya śuka wiṙyya śugiḥ
riṅ laku lamon tan. wruḥ paraniṅ sandi
budi lupa mawa kaṙyya cipta karasmi
śalaḥ sinpaṅ ciptane winoṙr iṅƞ asiḥ
saṅ prasida tuhun i widya lampa/hi
di ta pranaḥha hiya paṇḍi... rane
saṅƞ atapa ri sukma jñana wirati
ø sakti wiseśapra ri brata lwiḥ
kula hila bapa riṅƞ amat kadadin
haƞi si bapa haƞel mon dudu dṛwe
ø norana bapaṅ simpaṅ niṅ kidul.
ø haliṅ saṅ tapa hasmu taƞis

denanugal.
paƞeran racananiƞ ati siḍĕm gĕni wisaya
ø prapta pagagan./ lampaḥ tan aglis
miyat ṣaṅƞ amraḥ tapā pawĕs nala siƞit.
kadya humuṅ hawaṅsul., pra/naḥnya ƞanti riuh pulang ke sarang tempatnya menetap.
ø hasmu hegaṙ manaḥ tibra kikiṅ
wa/hu katiban waṙsā piṅ tiga liliṙ
ø mĕƞgaḥ tan mintara cipta niki
ø maga tan mitaṙra cipta niki
ø saḥ sakiṅ pag̈agan lampaḥnya haglis.,
laḥ diƞaṙyya saṅ tami wayy apupuḍe
ki dayakā suk./skaṙ lwiṙ katama ƞel.
haṙṣa nuta bawanira sa tamo r_ḥ
ø liṅ saṅ ḃi..ṣupa saṅ sipta mitajil.
haṙsa nuta ḃawanira saṅ tameṅ reḥ
ø liṅ saṅ bikṣuka saṅ sipta mijil.,
bratā ki salimut pralabda riṅƞ apti
ø siḍĕmn i yoga wuwusĕn maniḥ
ta koniƞana deniƞ aḍahaṙ wusnya mucaṅ maṅkya gotek

heman ewuḥ rarya hanom tañi ka
ṛpe
haƞusi kadaṅ wṛga tan ana sudi

haṛƞĕ pasraṅriṅ waraḥ hamalampaḥ di
nuluran. ḍataṅ
haƞusi kadaṅ wṛga tan ana sudi,
ø paja pajaniṅƞ eliṅ tan.n eliṅ,
tan katoli/ḥ hiṅ manira tan pahiƞan
suasuka/ rara mijil ṣaka ri lamu rowaṅƞe
hakĕkĕs awoṙ/ maras. ha puḍut ajriḥ
duk iƞ ampaḥ satkanisun iƞ aṙdi
ø tabĕḥ pat kani tƞaḥ wƞi
saṅ tapa wayaḥ tan aṇa syara
ø tiliṅ saṅ hyaṅ candra lumiṅsiṙ
ø tabĕ pat kaliḥ tƞaḥ wƞi
sa tapa yaḥ tan ana śwarane
ø tiliṅ saṅ hyaṅ candra lumisiṙ
ø saṅ tapa wayaḥ śig̈ra hudani
ø pira lawasira hana riṅƞ aṙdi
sira si bapa maṅṣa tan wruḥha,
ø woṅ paƞubon kabeḥ wus prapti
ø saṅ kaśoƞaniṅ yoga wus prapti
ø pada hyaṅ nini hanƞumi pirik
kaṅ sawiji lwiṙ sukma wanita manis.,
pada hyaṅ nini hadan busanā rame
habĕbĕda sira/ḥ, dwa tan prayatna kami
kadi kawƞan i saṅƞ añaṙ tumaki/
tan ana ni wwaṅ kaƞ lyan.
prapti sawesma tan dwa hucapĕn maniḥ
nora heraṅ ni taki mulih anaƞis/.
ø taƞeḥ yan. waṙnnanĕn saṅƞ akiki
tan. kacipta/ yen sinamon iṅ pawestri
sumimpĕn., saṅ hyaṅƞ aṙka ṛp tikaṅ wƞi
ø saṅƞ adiguru ƞuci riṅƞ atine
ø tan. lyan bapa lakasniṅƞ akikin
haywage kumaliƞā wruḥheṅ sira saṅƞ adi
manawi tan wruḥ/ riṅ lawan., rowaṅ
tanpa kliṙ saṅƞ adi tuw ajateni
ø haja tan ṣakti bakti hyaṅ widi
ø mewĕ saṅ wruḥha śariniṅ sandi

ø palakṣananiṅ wi
kw amet sari
sampun matuk ṣakṣana hadan agu/ liṅ
tan koniƞa heṅ wƞi rahina mana
sampun. tlas karakut i babad waṅsit
ø gĕnti tan pĕgat. wacana mijil
ri woṅƞ anom tan wun kasilib.
api tan wraḥ/ wisesa raga pribudi

hasmu binnaṙ lwiḥ tan aganiƞ a
ti
haƞi tugal. priḥ lkasira saṅ kili
keṅppa tanpa ƞaṙsa ye jalu tuha/n
yya ttan i rupa saṣolaḥhira nirukti
budi bocaḥ satata wikan iṅƞ ari
ø dibyani guṇa lyiṙ tanpa cantri

mapan tan wruḥ twasni
sabda lit
ø ki surajaya ƞukiḥ/ tanpa poliḥ
ø sahan i dora jutiniƞ ati
ø sira saṅ kawasa mutĕṙ sandi
tan wruḥ yen aneṅ rag̈a wiseṣa
ø laḥ tarimanĕn. de nta hayo lali
ø tinuna liwat. syara/ pa pinaji
ø ki surajaya mnĕṅ tanpa ṅliṅ
yen kita haṙsa hamoṅ mendrani budi
ø lamon ṣampun swiḥ hamoṅ/ budi
ṣaƞ aƞeca tan wriḥ krama hanak mami
ø manawy ana maṅnasa yeṅ gati
laḥ bapa hiƞĕtiƞĕt ayo tan aṅliṅ

haƞrik. syarani cataka lyiṙ ma
makilayu sakaẗa halasnya
ø pupuk muni santun lan kaḍasiḥ
ø laḥ kaky aligiḥha ta pukulun
saṅ bagya ri ḍataṅ hasmu kusut.
ø lamon tan. jnĕk i gunuṅ
ø nora lyan ṣira lann isun

hakeḥ woṅƞ aƞu
cap lapat. lbut
duk ṣira humoṙ/ ri saṅ katon
kaṅƞ akeḥ bapa maṅkya niṙ don
ø tan kawaṙnaha lane ri ƞnu
ø sapa ta namata tanya sun
luḥ mijil manaḥ tan wriḥ ko
ju/raṅ śĕkan saḥ sakiṅ tanniṅ lumampaḥ
ø mrik ta maruta ƞambyakĕn ṣari
lamat lamat riṅ tawaṅ lwiṙ kadya naƞis
ø ta/ƞeḥ yan waṙnanĕn lampaḥ niki
ø mo rahina nala pinṛm iṅƞ ati
ø sampun ṣalaḥ wṛdaya nak mami,
ki surajaya śun ajak mareṅ ri/ki
ø hadan ṣḍaḥ manaḥ kaṙya tami
wikann iṅ nayā daṙ/mmakawi liṅnya ris

ni tejapuspa neṅƞ umaḥ, waspada neṅƞ umaḥ haliṅ hali
ƞan
ø wikan iṅ praya ki śura
manaḥ mendra śinukma pinṛm iƞ ati
ø tñuḥ/ dayanira gagap gugup sandi

ø jiwa pyuḥ tugal tĕm.puḥniṅƞ a
pti
ø ki skaṙsara ṛmna manaḥ neki,
ø umnĕṅ kepwan ṣyuḥ cipta niki
muƞgwiṅ tṛnasna, sumurup iṅ lulut asiḥ
ø /haƞi kuna teṅsun duk wahu prapti
ø kaṅƞ apakṣa milw a/moṅ karasmi
ø tiḍĕmniṅ kjĕp tan ana taƞi,
kajaṅ śiraḥ tlĕs deniṅ lu mijil/.
katakya laya maka suṅ ṛtaṅƞiṅƞ ati
ø umtas. waspa nusap tan ana kari,
ø rare hano/m wikan i paranti
ø mahaḥ maśaḥ lwiṙ tanpa galiḥ
ø kaṙsaniṅ ñanā haśṛṅ tan jati
ø haja tan.n eliṅ salaḥ sawiji
riṅ sun. muliḥ haṙṣeṅ woṅ tan kapaḍan siḥ
ø maga tan mintaṙra śakiṅ riki
ø tan poliḥ don raga wu/s. kagisiṙ
na saƞ andon laƞĕ tan. wruḥhi lawan

ø pramana molaḥ daya ku
mtĕṙ
tĕmbya pangiḥ śilw aśiḥ lamon pawṛti
ø ya ḍuḥ masisun ni tejaśari
mijil sakiṅ lalaṭā hamaga liḥ kawi
ø lwiṙ cantaka malaṙ dṛnasniṅ riris
ø ki wani tan. kna mṛs sawƞi
samun dan awuƞ√ śaṅ wanita glis

paḍa mendra gu
muyu hablik. blik
ø gĕntiṅ tan pagat wacana mijil.
mon katmu rupane saṅ daṙmma jati
ø tan ṣipi ƞe/liṅƞ aripta kawi
hasuṅ wƞaniṅ wṛdaya, karananiṅ wṛdayā karananiṅƞ anunulis
ø piƞeniṅ waja/ wahu ta masiśig̈.
tibraniṅ ciptanirā ki surajaya tann ĕntiṅ
ni rutaṙjā ni skaṙ ni dośa,
kaṅ śawiji lwiṙ śukma wanita manis
ø ni rujataja rupa smu kuniṅ
ø ni tejasari/ tan lwan pinuji
cipta larā minukma riṅ daḷmm ati
ni rutaṙjā ni ratna/śarī ni wari
ø sampun mitaṙ kaƞ amoṅ karasmin
ø niṙ kula niṙ rupa niṙ prakawi
ka saśw asiḥ tan ana mule
haƞiṅ tugal priḥ rupanira saṅ kawi
woṅƞ anmaom ta/n wriṅ niṅ naya,
ø ki surajaya sihe tann ĕntiṅ
tanpa ƞucap liṙ rag̈a tanpa ẗma/ḥ
hasṛṅ sabdanira ni ẗe/jarī smu taƞis
lawas isun haƞeca ri sira nini
mon etaṅƞĕn iƞ aty apuwara siƞit
ø hagĕṅ maƞu tan lwan kaṅ kahesṭi
ø hakwe haṙśeṅ rupa tan katoliḥ
ø hasṛṅ tan pgat de/ni wis. pali
kaknan sih lulut iṅ pawestrī lwiḥ
kadya kon mṛmma śwaraniṅ pakṣi gĕnḍĕṅ
tusṭa nusuṅ pajraḥhi kaṅ saṙwa sari
kaṅƞ asokahasti lan ta ƞiri putiḥ
ø tibra/niṅ jñana liṙ kadi kanin
ø ki surawani miyaẗ waṙnani tulis
ki samaya lagya kaknan i titi
ø liṙ pandani/ hyaṅ nug̈raha widi
tka wetan pun mi/tra budi kapalis
waṛg lara braṅta kasmaran i budi
ø hiṅ rajuna reren tigaṅ sakṣi
hapa/n tuṅgal deniƞ amaƞun lara siḥ
ø di kaṅ sinanjya haƞeca maṅkin
maṙmani sukma tatya niṙ tanpa gati
ø balik anĕṅguḥ rame ri kawi
dawĕg kakaṅ haƞeca mari hi kawi
laḥ ta reren ṣarira karasa ƞliḥ
hadan kĕñaṙ hyaṅ diwaṅkara munya jrit
wotĕn kanya tog̈ya na mawisik wisik
ø hasmu eraṅ wacana tan mijil
ø hĕdi desa kaki dera hisṭi

niṙ tan ana sajyaniƞ a
ƞeca

hadu
m ayu ri maṙga hisun lumaris
ni skaṙja ni sabrata neṅ tpi
ø tan tmaṅ deniƞ amoṅƞ abukti
ø tan ṣipi ƞeniƞ ambĕk ṣumakti
ø mandra ṛmĕ praḃa saṅ hyaṅ sakṣi
lyiṙ/ woṅ wadon ha/ñaṙ lamaky ahakili
ø gugurane sinuk tan i tikaḥ
piṇḍa hewa tumiƞal i para kili
ø ki saẗawaṅ tanya liṅnya haris
ø tanpa sana batuṙ teṅsun yayi
ø punapa kakaṅ yen ṣira hapti
sapa nama paƞeran ṣaƞ asuṅ braṅti

tan a
pisaḥ ciptaku yayi sumiƞit
ø ḍuḥ tan darana kamy aniƞali
ø tumaṅgĕḥ ta rena saṅ pawistri
wus kagiwaṅ tan eliṅ salaḥ ṣawiji
ø hewuḥ ni cipta makin arusit
ni skaṙ/ja hapakṣa ñidra heṅ wƞi
ø sinawuṅ ri tṛsna lulut asiḥ
laḥ ta luƞa paƞeran yen ṣira hasiḥ
nora gawok manira ri suka sugiḥ
lwiḥ hisun aṙsa ri sira nini
ø saya himbuḥ tṛsnane tan ṣipi
ø datan iraṅ saṅƞ amoṅ karasmin
ø tusṭa manaḥ hyaṅƞ anaṅƞga mi/ di
ni skaṙja/ tansaḥ mara ri wƞi
ø punapa kakaṅ yen watĕn apti
ø laḥ ƞoṅ/ƞ iḍĕp ṣabdanira kaki

ø sipi tṛsna ni
ra saṅ katoliḥ
kadya ƞipi kaṅƞ awak mareṅ saṅ tami
ø ki surajaya mnĕ tanpa liṅ
rob tan pahiƞan yayi wtuni titiṙ
ø wyaṙ ta tutuṙ hilaṅ tanpa gati
ø kaṅ su/rajaya kaya ta/n kawi
tan lyan kaki ginumnĕ nastapa niki
ni skaṙja tanti marasa niƞ ati

ø hada
n amuhun ki surawani
sampun luƞa kih eca ƞinĕpa maniḥ
ø pada hyaṅ nini tan pinisigiḥ
ki samaya tan adoḥ ƞimbaṅƞi liri
lyiṙ tatani kusuma taṅ batuṙr adi
ø tanpa tmu linya gejoṅƞ aris
ø wontĕn pada hyaṅ nini kakaliḥ
baya wnaṅ jaluw areren i riki
nora wahu yen ana kaḍĕga kampiṙ
ø wa/niḥ kari braṅta wulaƞun kapti
ø niṙ ta lampaḥ no/rana sun iṣṭi
lamon ana lyiṙ moda suka saṅ budi
ø tuwu rame patapan i kawi
hatut maṙga tan lyan kaṅ sinĕdya
tapi ludra kaṅƞ awa ka/dya ƞon aƞin
ø pratayatna ni saṅ ṣikṣya kurati
sakiṅ wetan pun surajaya moṅ kapti

ø ḍawuḥ heka ki
lyan saṅ hyaṅ rawi
ṣampun dondon hiḥ kaki denira kampiṙ
bayay hadoḥ kaṅ wisma hapiṇḍa ƞliḥ
mandra ṛmĕṅ/ hasṛṅ ni mega na/ prapti
ø pa mṛṅƞĕs gatrani candra ƞukuli
tan ṣinipi kasiyani raga niki limpad
hadan ṣuci busana sira hi sa/mpun
ø ya ḍuḥ harinisu/n masku kaki
ø yayaḥ hedan manaḥ hiƞ akikin
ki samaya sumahuṙr awoṙ luḥ mijil
sira saṅ kataman ṣaḥ hamriḥ kapatin
ø tu/turira kakaṅ de/nkatoliḥ sukaniƞamuktirame taƞekna sampun
ø ya ḍuḥ harinisun masku rusit
ø hadan laku sig̈ra tanpa noliḥ
prapti paran kapukuṙ ri gunuṅ kawi

ø
makin tan ṣurud tidaknya pṛgi
reka wukal hujalan waṙna ri/ gati
ramwadan busanā wwaṅ jro paḍa krigan
mwaṅ woṅ batuṙ tusṭa nurag̈a ƞiriṅ
haśra munya raraƞin., kĕn...ṅ goṅ karihin
ø saṅ nata śig̈ra tan ṣurud.
hage lampahi ba/la wus., prapti palasa
rob tan ṣurud. kweḥniṅ wwaṅ tur adi,
hanu śridanta lwa/n. woṅ tameṅ smu
batuṙr iṅƞ agatrā woṅƞ gaṙjita duluṙ
haḍaratt i, malaṅ ma sumiri/ riṅ ƞna

śig̈ra tan ṣurud. prapteṅ pa
nataran.,
ḃap alaneṅ ḍakā lan ta nareśwari
loṙ wetan haruƞu wwa ƞ aguntaṅ
kucĕmmiṅ saṅ hyaṅ candrā baƞun rahina
prapteṅƞ eśuk saṅ hyaṅƞ aṙ/ka humijil.,
lag̈wa namun., wihyaṅ tan karawaśa ƞiriṅ

ø tan pwaliḥ deniṅƞ aƞipu
k
tan wriṅ yen praṅ jbugwaƞiṅ para mantri,
rame/ kaṅƞ ayĕƞan tan ana maḍani,
denira wu/yu laḥ mintaṙ sakiṅ riki,
hamusuḥhana daṙmma haṛp iṅ jro palaḥ
ø tan. pendaḥ bineda ri kuṅ sa hasmara haƞuñcaṅ haweḥ lulut.t iṅƞ

atapa sadya hayu hyaṅ widw a
mig̈nani
ø saḥni hyaṅ kadi/ tanpa su
mwaṅ saṅya karasa pawaraḥhira saṅƞ adi,/
yayī laḥ mitaṙ haƞeca riṅ wilis,
duk prapti jaganluṅ, makwa ƞantun antun
miyat duƞusiṅ para roṅ, priga noƞi
ø datann ana simpaṅƞipun ahadaruṅ punaṅ maṙggā praptaheṅ
mĕtas iṅ pracimma duk. tkeṅ kaba™aran./
sa mu/dra saṅbramma ranā saṅ tami
di pinakanira saṅba ƞ añaṙ prapti,
ø tameṅ saṅ sipta wruḥ smu
tlas akwe niṅ prawatā kanḍaniṅ/ ranatus.
haƞiṅ sih aja pati turidā ri huwus

la, la
gwa puƞguṅ tan ana ƞatihati
lu deni kiwa hamet datan pwaliḥ,
manḍĕg maƞu mayoṅ tan wriṅ paran.
dera laƞut bapa niṙ tanpa gawe
lamo tan wraḥ sasanānira saṅ wiku
lampaḥ tanpa kaṙyya twas/. brata ƞliḥ.
ya ḍuḥ dipire nora heṅ sira
punapa ƞ bapa kaṅ dera hulati
ø tan pwaly atanya hariṅƞ isun.
ø saṅ śiwa beda wus tinut
pramana hiƞ aƞecā/ hamulik tan poliḥ
yen aglaṙ, sabda wikann iṅ paranti
lwiḥ lamon ana pustakadi tatwa lwiḥ
ya holiya sapikul., maṅkin kawacican manaḥ manaḥkw i
ø yen ana warah iri sun
ṣira saṅ jati tuhu yalilā warana
tuhu prayatnā tama tan. kneṅƞ uguṅ
duḥ taƞe paƞeran ranak hyaṅ, kumawi
ø makin kiteṅsun anmu mahaprananiṅ/ śasabda hawaraḥn
saṅƞ alaƞut putus iṅ naya sandi
waniḥ saṅ wruḥ tatwaniṅ sabda gati
sĕsĕk. pnuḥ tanbĕḥ hana ta daṙ/mmaji

ø punika liṅƞera saṅ waspadeṅ tiƞa
l.
halaḥ deniṅ tanpa rasa heṅƞ ati
tan ananiṅ ḃoga tiḷ/m deniṅ prapti,
rahina tatas lamĕṅ saṅ hyaṅƞ aṙkka
lan taṅ woṅ lamajaṅ sakweniṅ wini/h eliṅ
ø prapteṅƞ esuk punaṅ woṅ luraḥ gintiṙ/,
jana wetann i kaww amasĕḥ karuhun
nira ta saṅ binoroṅ riṅ para tanḍa

lwan taṅ polaman., wo
buntĕl karihin
dan satuwuk timbul tan wri niki/
datan wawaṅ wahu kinĕmbulan., tan keguḥ
ø ki sora lawan ki samud
lwan taṅ kĕnḍaṅ goṅ/, daṙpa gĕntuta ran.,
ø sakweniṅ para putra ƞ dibya ka/ruhun
tan talak kadya susuluṅ saka wetanda., tumahap taṅ buruḥ
rameniṅ praṅ jbĕṅ kabayan iṅƞ adu,
rinukk iṅ tṛgala lwiṙ kar_ṅ tinanḍi gaṙjita woṙ maras. twĕnasniṅra wira
sinudakula nama lalanasambu, mwaṅ bañakputĕran. kala howaḥ
wany anmu wira paḍa śraṅ tumitiḥ
ha wa/niḥ kaṅ kapranan hanuli mati,
hapi sadu kaḃabaran aƞutil siniṅƞatanḍakĕp iṅƞ atanḍā rowaṅnya
kaget kaṅ praṅ g̈uṙnita rusakkiṅ pasaṙ
mwa... woṅ daṙmma kna paṙ malayu,
tatabuhane tan muni hata/gal ta praṅ wataṅ masiḥ woṅ saka
meḥ riƞ unḍaṅƞan., tann agiḥ pawṛti
sinapiḥ riṅ praṅ wataṅ paḍa wus piraṅnya,
śurajaya mulat ṣaksat i praṅ lagi
sakweniṅ para putrā ḍarat riṅ/ƞ ĕnu
aglis ki śora lawan ki samud.,
dwira tan luwaṙ si kṣarakpira titiḥ sami
makin ki samun haywadoḥ kalawan kami
tann ana wanī hamapaga kaṅ buruḥ

woṅ palaḥ niṙ don de
nya gonḍala
maƞga kalaha riṅ sabummi ƞoṅ tann ajriḥ
kaṅ wus luhuṅ ƞoṅ papage pribudi
kaṅ praṅ wataṅ tumandaṅ kaṅ buruḥ
mesĕm saṙww aƞayatti, hegaṙ kaṅ pawestri
suliriṅ meh kalbuwa riṅ sumuṙ, munduṙr aƞujita watan./ mata kalohan

habarakal. gugulune pahumanniṅ kumbaṅ, tuṙ kĕneṅ bubu
kpapatatanehalaya hamampakgetoƞamanḍa k pahu...iṅ
tan wruḥ/ yeja n cicinḍile patiṅ pucat.,
wruḥ riṅ tawaṅ śik ṣakweḥniṅ buruḥ
juburuḥ, jaba mwaṅ jro gusti tan kantun
lwan ta/ woṅƞ abapaṅ, ƞnaƞnaƞĕn tan kari
ø woṅ wetan kadya kadya binaƞun
muƞal tandaṅƞe kanṭine tann ana wruḥ,
ø gajaḥpanisĕt wriṅ smu hamaƞuṣap. lmaḥ twĕke denḍapani
ha/ƞi tan pragalba haƞanti gati sḍĕṅƞi wwaṅ daṙmma konduṙ pra wataṅ,
ø tandaṅƞe karasa lasu lalanasambu ta wa/n wruḥ riṅ lawan.
ikī duk sinuduk. mṛg̈ĕgĕḥ tan panakis
tĕrus. nuju walikat hamalĕs tan poliḥ/
tlaskakoras prayatna ki śora tameṅ smu
praṅ wataṅ praṅ ḍaḍap daṙpa gĕnturan,
ṣig̈ra tuluṅ, ko/niƞa dera saṅƞ aji
sinapiḥ tan kana kweniṅ buruḥ mati
ki śora pabawa wa/yaḥhi woṅƞ alit
wit iṅ bo/janāwak paḍa dene mati
lwiṙr atur√ kunaṅ si burw agati
tatune hapranna linud. tiknaniṅ riṅ kris
paḍa ƞ_śiṙ humaḥ, kala huwa hawiḥ

sigiḥ pukulun. kaṅ nama pun. śora
ki ssaora lwan kasiḥhirā saṅ prabu

swaṙgganiṅ jayeṅrana
paḍa tan kew ḥ
tan. tlag deniṅ kaww amiweka sabda/
ø hiḥ tan makanaha niṅ laku

ki śo
ra lwiḥ tan ana maḍani
mwaṅ ta giśiṙ deniṅ ki śora
lampaḥhipun. hari/ne tan. śaḥ riṅ wuri
riṅ maḍapā saṙww aripta tulisa ṣ
kakaṅ/ laḥ ta niniƞali daḷm. pisan.,
panjriaḥniṅ saṙwwa śari kadwa/ muṙwwa kuṅ

kadukap.
ḍawuḥ pisan pi ro pi tlu
sig̈ra prapti daha tan wuwusĕn mani
anut lampaḥ datan wruḥ hiƞ ena
ø luwaṙ tanṣaḥ raga na/mun kapti
ta/n poliḥ do/n. keḥni wig̈raha kapaṅgiḥ
ḍuḥ kaƞ awak masa ta dadiya dmi
ø ritni wanaƞel tan ana wani
niṙ tan lampaḥ sumilib kaṅ denulati
hmas manik miraḥ wkasiƞ ayu puṗuji
ø pinet i yoga nora kapaṅgiḥ
ø pira lawasi raga gĕ braṅti
piraṅ wulan hadṛsi liri kaka di
ø keḥni desa kaṅ sun lakoni
hapan minaka ligani kaṅ sapta bumi
kasaśayan pun mitra wikana ri tri,
maṙman isun ri kina midĕr i bumi
ø nadyan piṅ sapta diwasa kaki
hagampaṅ dera saṅ wikan i naya
ø sinĕṅgy adoḥ bali lan i kliṅ
saṅ sukla niṙmala wruḥ sarini śari
kaṅ tuhu sun a/guru heṅ kaki
laḥ hakariya/ ki rujakṣela hisun apamit
ø tan kawaṙnaha, ri maṙga pṛgi
pan wus tĕlas pamutĕsi sabda gati
balika ta hale/ler i patapan ĕdi
ø ṛgĕp de nta yo tan keku
ø datan adoḥ ḍukuḥ ri sun
ø ya rag̈a tan. kna winastu
tan ana ri wḋi riƞ ati
is tri suṙyya luput i nasĕ

sira ri ka
py ana maca,

div.ab: //0// sampun. tla/s iṅƞ anulaṙ, riṅ jĕṅ giri kanisṭan. imbaṅ riṅƞ eṙsĕnya, gĕgĕṙ camara jajaṙ coraḥ bojana ṛm., śinampunnanuiṅƞ anurat/. śoma pwan. riṅ matal. hasṭawara nuju yama, nawawara nuju keraƞan., sad.wara nuju paniron., catuṙwara/ nuju śri, triwara nuju byantara, wuku daḷm. śoma kaliwon si wuye, punika lawĕ lawĕniṅƞ anurat. sastra hagĕṅƞ ali/t. śri gitiṅƞĕn haraṅ haṛt., hagĕpok hanuḍuk haguwĕk haḍupak hamikal. hanujaḥ, satiṅ sulekraḥ hatiƞgal/. huwit. corak carek kaya tilasiṅ pacul., t ...
